home.description: Welcome to my website, you can find here everything about me, my skills and work.

about.name: About
about.description: I'm Ronald Regalado,student of Automatic Engineering at the Technological University of Havana 'CUJAE' My passion for programming led me to become a frontend developer.Throughout my studies and personal projects I have acquired skills in, HTML,CSS y Javascript, and I have worked with frameworks like Bootstrapto create responsive and attractive interfaces. I'm always willing to face new challenges and learn new technologies that allow me to develop as a professional.
